rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A transitional space leading to the living area and staircase

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan area with minimalist design and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light; serves as common living and dining space.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact and efficient kitchen area integrated into the living room, featuring modern fixtures and storage solutions.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom with minimalist fixtures near the entrance for guests.

openings.description: A modern door that blends security and style.
Access to a spacious balcony offering an outdoor seating area.
Floor-to-ceiling windows for enhanced natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage and a private balcony for relaxation; designed according to Vastu principles with the bed aligned to the north.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Functional guest room that can also serve as an office; features a dedicated balcony area.

rooms.name: Study/Occupied Closet
rooms.description: Multipurpose space for work or additional storage, integrated seamlessly into the design.

openings.description: Spacious balcony offering outdoor relaxation and views.
Spacious balcony designed for guest comfort.
Modern staircase ensuring safe and easy movement between floors.
